parameters.query:
WITH date_range AS (
  SELECT 
    DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE) as week_start,
    DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '6 days' as week_end
)
SELECT 
  'revenue' as metric,
  SUM(amount) as value,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM transactions
WHERE created_at BETWEEN (SELECT week_start FROM date_range) AND (SELECT week_end FROM date_range)
AND type = 'revenue'
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'new_customers' as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM customers
WHERE created_at BETWEEN (SELECT week_start FROM date_range) AND (SELECT week_end FROM date_range)
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'support_tickets' as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value,
  AVG(resolution_time_hours) as count
FROM support_tickets
WHERE created_at BETWEEN (SELECT week_start FROM date_range) AND (SELECT week_end FROM date_range)

SELECT 
  p.name as project_name,
  p.status,
  p.progress_percentage,
  p.due_date,
  pm.name as project_manager,
  COUNT(DISTINCT t.id) as total_tasks,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN t.status = 'completed' THEN t.id END) as completed_tasks,
  STRING_AGG(DISTINCT CASE WHEN t.status = 'blocked' THEN t.title END, ', ') as blocked_tasks
FROM projects p
JOIN users pm ON p.manager_id = pm.id
LEFT JOIN tasks t ON p.id = t.project_id
WHERE p.status IN ('active', 'at_risk')
GROUP BY p.id, p.name, p.status, p.progress_percentage, p.due_date, pm.name
ORDER BY p.due_date

SELECT 
  t.name as team_name,
  COUNT(DISTINCT tm.user_id) as team_size,
  COUNT(DISTINCT ta.task_id) as tasks_completed,
  AVG(ta.completion_time_hours) as avg_completion_time,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN sr.created_at > CURRENT_DATE - 7 THEN sr.user_id END) as standup_participation
FROM teams t
JOIN team_members tm ON t.id = tm.team_id
LEFT JOIN task_assignments ta ON tm.user_id = ta.user_id 
  AND ta.completed_at BETWEEN DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE) AND CURRENT_DATE
LEFT JOIN standup_responses sr ON tm.user_id = sr.user_id
  AND sr.created_at BETWEEN DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE) AND CURRENT_DATE
GROUP BY t.id, t.name
ORDER BY t.name
